DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate relative benefit daily disposable contact lenses versus spectacle young adult .
DOC.brief_title: A Lifestyle Investigation With Spectacles Daily Disposable Contact Lenses Young Patients
DOC.criteria: Understands right research subject willing able sign Statement Informed Consent , 18 , parent guardian understand right willing able sign Statement Informed Consent . Willing able follow protocol . Currently wear spectacle fulltime ( least five day per week , eight hour per day ) . Has never wear contact lens ( one day ) . Agrees participate clinical research duration study . Can attain least 6/9 eye study optical correction . Can fit study lenses available power range ( contact lens group ) select satisfactory spectacle lens frame lens ( spectacle group ) . Willing able wear study lenses spectacle minimum five day per week , eight hour per day . Owns regular access mobile phone familiar SMS text messaging . Has uptodate functional pair spectacle time enrollment . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Has ocular systemic disorder would normally contraindicate contact lens wear . Is use topical medication eye drop ointment . Has corneal refractive surgery . Has cataract surgery . Has diabetes . Has take part clinical research within two week start study . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
